body_html:
Greetings to the tensorflow community,

Annanay proposed to do this as a GSoC project. From the Polly (Labs) side we think this is a great idea. However, none of our mentors has experience with tensorflow. Is there someone from the tensorflow community who can and would like to co-mentor this project?

Michael

body:
Greetings to the tensorflow community,

Annanay proposed to do this as a GSoC project. From the Polly (Labs) side we think this is a great idea. However, none of our mentors has experience with tensorflow. Is there someone from the tensorflow community who can and would like to co-mentor this project?

Michael
